changelog.entry: Engi deal half damage to systems in addition to crew

crewBlueprint.name: engi
crewBlueprint.title: Engi
crewBlueprint.desc: It's unclear if the 'Engi' are partly organic or entirely mechanical, but it's well known that they make exceptional engineers.

powerList.power: Deals half damage to crew and systems

changelog.entry: Mantis deal 50 percent more damage to systems in addition to crew

crewBlueprint.name: mantis
crewBlueprint.title: Mantis
crewBlueprint.desc: The Mantis disregard for individual lives led to their evolution as a vicious warrior race.

powerList.power: Deals 1.5x damage to crew and systems

crewBlueprint.name: slug
crewBlueprint.title: Slug
crewBlueprint.desc: These telepathic Slugs were shunned in the Galactic Federation for their constant thievery and attempts at manipulation.

changelog.entry: Rockmen fire fire extinguishing speed 1.67 to 2.0

crewBlueprint.name: rock
crewBlueprint.title: Rockman
crewBlueprint.desc: The 'Rockmen' of Vrachos IV are rarely seen and are known for their fortitude.

crewBlueprint.name: energy
crewBlueprint.title: Zoltan
crewBlueprint.desc: The 'Zoltan' are allies of the 'Engi.' Their innate energy can power ship systems.

powerList.power: 15 damage to enemy crew on death

changelog.entry: Crystal crew fire extinguishing speed 0.83 to 1.0

powerList.power: Active: lock the room with a wall of crystals

crewBlueprint.name: anaerobic
crewBlueprint.title: Lanius
crewBlueprint.desc: These anaerobic beings seem friendly enough.

powerList.power: No damage from lack of oxygen

crewBlueprint.name: orchid
crewBlueprint.title: Orchid
crewBlueprint.desc: These floral lifeforms have little in common with Earth plants but fill air with oxygen just as well.

powerList.power: Provide oxygen to rooms they are in (as long as the ship they're on has O2 system)
Put out fires at half speed

crewBlueprint.name: lizard
crewBlueprint.title: Lizard
crewBlueprint.desc: The Lizards are respected in the Federation for their ability to withstand hardship and come out alive after any disaster.

powerList.power: Regenerates health when not in danger

crewBlueprint.name: pavonian
crewBlueprint.title: Pavonian
crewBlueprint.desc: Proud Pavonians are fragile creatures, but willing to sacrifice themselves to save their comrades.

powerList.power: Takes double damage in close combat
Active: fully repair system losing 75 health

crewBlueprint.name: warped
crewBlueprint.title: Warped
crewBlueprint.desc: Masters of staying unseen, even the Warped have not managed to remain neutral in the Galactic War.

powerList.power: Active: become invisible and invulnerable for 10 seconds

crewBlueprint.name: strider
crewBlueprint.title: Strider
crewBlueprint.desc: Masters of staying unseen, even the Striders have not managed to remain neutral in the Galactic War.

powerList.power: Active: become invisible and invulnerable for 10 seconds
Take half damage in close combat
